recipesJson.name: Catalina Resurrect
recipesJson.author: Screwdriver
recipesJson.description:
Catalina has resurrected... 
You know what happens when new flavors come around. It's resurrection time for your older recipes. 
So once more, as the Aliens are still Vaping, here's my take on their sweet Strawberry Kiwi e-juice.
I like to make this one quite sweet, like them Vaping Aliens have it in their commercial juices of course too.

Enjoy & comment please.
Screwdriver
